title: What are the four reasons (arguments) for ethical relativism? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m against ethical relativism - yet can give these arguments for it: Fewer grounds for moral conflictsAbility to explain it without mystical concepts like God and soulMorality models based on ethical relativism tend to be easily compatibleAllows users to avoid any kind of moral responsibility and judgment - both towards himself and othersOverall I would dare to say, that ethical relativism can be more efficient, than objectivism - but only for an individual (not society) and short-term.
